name: 51nb remove ad
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("51nb.com"),domain("thinkpad.cn") {

div[class^="ad"],div[class="a_h"],span[style="float:left;"],div[class="wp a_f"],
div[class="adbox"],
td[style="overflow: hidden;"],
div[class="right"],
td[style="overflow: hidden; background: none repeat scroll 0% 0% rgb(255, 246, 213);"],
[href="http://www.yayanb.com"],
td[width="16.6%"],
[href="/mt1.php"],
p[id="copyright"],
[href*="sznet110"],
[src*="szbooks"],
[src*="http://unstat.baidu.com/"],
ul[class="ad_2"],
ul[class="ad_3"],
table[width="98%"],.a_pb,embed[ width="970"]
{display:none !important;}}
